snippet: The journalist faces charges for publishing confidential information from an investigation into the assassination of Rafik Hariri, the former Lebanese prime minister.
abstract: Trial of Lebanese journalist Karma al-Khayat begins in Hague; Khayat is charged with obstruction of justice and contempt of court for publishing confidential information from international investigation into 2005 assassination of former Lebanese Prim Min Rafik Hariri.
lead_paragraph: The journalist faces charges for publishing confidential information from an investigation into the assassination of Rafik Hariri, the former Lebanese prime minister.

headline.main: Trial of Karma al-Khayat, Lebanese Journalist, Begins in Hague Tribunal
headline.print_headline: Lebanese Journalist’s Trial Begins in Hague Tribunal
